value.latex:
$$\begin{align*}
\mathrm{d} \left(\ln(xy)\right)&= \frac{\mathrm d(xy)}{xy}
= \frac{x\mathrm dy+y\mathrm dx}{xy}= \frac{\mathrm dy}{y}
+\frac{\mathrm dx}{x} ;
\\
\mathrm{d} \left(xyz(1+\sinh(yz))\right)&=(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}(xyz)
+xyz\mathrm{d}(\sinh(yz))
\\
&=
yz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}x
+
xz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}y
+
xy(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}z
\\
&\quad
+xyz\cosh(yz)\mathrm{d}(yz)
\\
&=
yz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}x
+
xz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}y
+
xy(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}z
\\
&\quad
+xyz^2\cosh(yz)\mathrm{d}y
+xy^2z\cosh(yz)\mathrm{d}z
\\
&=
yz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}x
\\
&\quad
+
xz(1+\sinh(yz) +yz\cosh(yz))
\mathrm{d}y
\\
&\quad +
xy(1+\sinh(yz)+ yz\cosh(yz))\mathrm{d}z ;
\end{align*}$$

$$\begin{align*}
\mathrm{d} \left(\sin(x^2y) \mathrm e^{x-y}\right)&=
\left(\cos(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\right)\mathrm{d}(x^2y)
+\sin(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}(x-y)
\\
&=
x^2\cos(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}y
+
2xy\cos(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}x
\\
&\quad
+\sin(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}x-
\sin(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}
\mathrm{d}y
\\
&=
\left(x^2\cos(x^2y)x-
\sin(x^2y)\right)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}y
\\
&\quad +
\left(2xy\cos(x^2y)+\sin(x^2y)\right) \mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}x .
\end{align*}$$

\[\begin{align*} \mathrm{d} \left(\ln(xy)\right)&= \frac{\mathrm d(xy)}{xy} = \frac{x\mathrm dy+y\mathrm dx}{xy}= \frac{\mathrm dy}{y} +\frac{\mathrm dx}{x} ; \\ \mathrm{d} \left(xyz(1+\sinh(yz))\right)&=(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}(xyz) +xyz\mathrm{d}(\sinh(yz)) \\ &= yz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}x + xz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}y + xy(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}z \\ &\quad +xyz\cosh(yz)\mathrm{d}(yz) \\ &= yz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}x + xz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}y + xy(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}z \\ &\quad +xyz^2\cosh(yz)\mathrm{d}y +xy^2z\cosh(yz)\mathrm{d}z \\ &= yz(1+\sinh(yz))\mathrm{d}x \\ &\quad + xz(1+\sinh(yz) +yz\cosh(yz)) \mathrm{d}y \\ &\quad + xy(1+\sinh(yz)+ yz\cosh(yz))\mathrm{d}z ; \end{align*}\]

\[\begin{align*} \mathrm{d} \left(\sin(x^2y) \mathrm e^{x-y}\right)&= \left(\cos(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\right)\mathrm{d}(x^2y) +\sin(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}(x-y) \\ &= x^2\cos(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}y + 2xy\cos(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}x \\ &\quad +\sin(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}x- \sin(x^2y)\mathrm e^{x-y} \mathrm{d}y \\ &= \left(x^2\cos(x^2y)x- \sin(x^2y)\right)\mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}y \\ &\quad + \left(2xy\cos(x^2y)+\sin(x^2y)\right) \mathrm e^{x-y}\mathrm{d}x . \end{align*}\]
